content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the boardwalk in the center of myrtle beach,looking at the ocean at dusk.  first couple of stars in the sky were barely visible.  planes and boats were still plainly visible.  

all of a sudden relatively large golden/orange ball appeared and glowed brightly for approx. 1-2 seconds then faded quickly.  a 2nd appeared and faded in the exact same fashion right beside the first.  a third and then 4 appeared/faded in the exact same fashion.  all appeared in an exactly straight line.  5 appeared, glowed and faded directly below the line of the other 4.  all appeared and faded sequentially.  when the first faded, the second appeared 1-2 seconds later. when 2nd faded the 3rd appeared and so on.  

entire incindent lasted approx. 10-15 seconds.

as i explained planes and other objects were still plainly visible as it was dusk.  there were not other objects associated with these lights.  although it was fairly clear with no cloud reference, they appeared to be a few miles away and quite large.  the lights were significantly larger and significantly brighter than the planes arriving and departing the airport a few miles to the south. 

the glow was similar to a firey color/fashion - what i imagine a fighter jet engine flare would look like if you were looking directly into its tail.  as if a jet went full throttle and then quickly throttled back.  only much larger.  it almost appeared to burn and disappear like a flare only each light was perfectly stationary.  

when it was over i looked around to see if anyone else had seen it and there was only an asian couple - like any ignorant american, i naturally assumed wouldn't speak english and didn't talk to them :) i asked several couples that walked by if they'd seen it but no one else seemed to have been looking.  i kept watching the sky for 15 min but saw nothing else. 
 
either way feel very lucky to have witnessed something so spectacular.  from a cursory search of google, i'm one of several dozen folks who have seen such a thing a myrtle beach over the last 5 years.
content.summary: 4 large yellow/orange round lights appeared & faded sequentially.. each glowed brightly for 1-2 sec., then faded quickly.  lights were in straight line appearing equidistant from one another.  finally 5th light appeared / faded below original line.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the train station in my neighborhood while i was checking out the stars. when, something in my peripheral catches my attention. i was watching a star, slowly move across the sky! i watched very closely so i wouldn't lose the ufo among the other stars. it then made one very abrupt direction change, but continued on it's same course across the sky. at that very instant i knew it wasn't an air plane. in fact, i spotted at least 4 planes during the ufo sighting. i recognized that this ufo was way beyond normal altitude for our planes. it was literally, as if a star, a normal star, was moving with intelligence across the sky.

i called my mother to tell her what i saw. she tried to say i must have seen a plane. after getting off the phone, i see another one. same deal, except this one does not make any abrupt changes in it's flight pattern. it does however look exactly like the other ufo and stars in the sky.
content.summary: Just like a star...Except it was moving. there were no differences between the ufo and other stars in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Driving to work w/b hwy 152 by san luis reservior. saw a bright shiny thing floating across the sky by top of the mountain. got to the top of pacheco pass at dinosaur point and pulled over and took a picture (8 mps camara phone). couldn't get close enough to get a real good look, from the distance it appeared square to rectangular shape like a smooth trash can. it was approx 7am in the morning, clear early morning day, no fog, clear with high clouds. as i continued to work, i noticed several other vehicles stop look at the sky and taking pictures. i could see the object any more as i drove down the hill.
content.summary: Shinny object floating across sky, look like big square balloon

content.detailedDescription: Waling towards the car and noticed a reflective flash above the row homes where we were parked, looked up and i said to my brother "look look look!" he noticed the last flash as he rounded the corner. we stayed there for another half hour or so looking up but saw nothing more.
content.summary: 4 reflective flashes than vanished

content.detailedDescription: Fireball from sky falling like meteor or space junk
content.summary: Fireball heading north

content.detailedDescription: Standing along exmouth waiting for the bus facing sw towards the border,when i ended up seeing three long missle like looking planelike images dark gray in colour. the wide view of the sky allowed me to view each flying duration for about 6 to 8 seconds, appearing in the distance. trees & buildings closer to me limited my seeing where they actually came from and where they were headed. i didnt really think anything when i noticed the first one.  just instantly thought how odd to see an f15 fighter jet fly over so low and no noise. then i was thinking how neat to see that but then i questioned myself...Was that a military plane? next thing i knew i saw a second one flying along the same path roughly 30 seconds later. they didnt fly very fast just a steady paced glide almost. i tried to listen for the noise and couldnt hear anything other than the cars going by along the street. f15s make loud noise & dont fly that low.  if i didnt know better they could've been low enough to fly under the bridges or just overtop.  then to my surprise i saw a third and then my eyes were glued to the sky to see if there would be another.  no more appeared. i'm a skeptic but i sure will say this really intrigued me to investigate if any planes were in the area etc. i could find nothing & found nothing of any other people reporting to see them. i was excited & yet shook up about the whole thing & cant get the images out of my mind what i had seen.
content.summary: Three objects flew from nw to s steady line about 30 seconds apart

content.detailedDescription: My friend went to the beach and sent me this picture and when i expanded the picture theres a gray object right above the water in the center of the picture.
content.summary: My friend sent me this picture and when i expanded it in the center right above the water is an object

content.detailedDescription: My friend went to the beach and sent me this picture and when i expanded the picture theres a gray object right above the water in the center of the picture.
content.summary: My friend sent me this picture and when i expanded it in the center right above the water is an object

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work about 3:50 pm est in full afternoon sunlight. i saw the oject as i was driving and tried to watch it as well as the road. as i kept looking between the road and the object, it completely disappeared. it was clearly not a plane. since i was in the car there was no way of hearing any sound. it was close enough to view but not right in my immediate area.
content.summary: It was a shining silver metallic almost rounded, stationary object that disappeared instantly

content.detailedDescription:
i was outside taking pictures of the clouds. i went around to the side of the house and was taking pictures of the chemtrails. i never even seen the object until i was checking my pictures on my digital camera. it is very hard to see the object without zooming in. this is the second time i have caught something on pictures i have taken within the past 2 years. 

  i am putting the original photo on here as well as the one i just darkened a little so it is easier to see the object.
content.summary: Black ufo/ object

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside taking pictures of clouds and chemtrails. it wasn't until after i took all the pictures that i was looking through them on my digital camera is when i saw something that i couldn't see with my naked eye. this is the second time i have caught something unexplainable on a picture i have taken in the past 2 years. i'm not sure if it is anything military or extraterristreal. in the picture you need to look up in the left side corner an zoom in to see what it is. 

 in the second picture that i have uploaded is actually the the picture i took before i took the picture that captured the black object.
content.summary: Black ufo/ object

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were sitting on the lanai outside. we just finished dinner and we were enjoying the evening. it was clear night with bright stars, not completely dark yet. suddenly, i noticed a something with red - orange light silently flying in the air towards us (direction of southwest). i made a joke that it is ufo flying to abduct us. it turned it's course away from us and immediately we noticed one more object flying towards us. i made a comment that maybe this one is going to abduct us. then the third one came. suddenly we realized that the first one had disappeared, too fast for anything traveling at this speed (helocopter speed). at that point we looked at each other and exclaimed " what are we waiting for?". i had binoculars in mind but my husband rushed to the bedroom and got out a telescope. meanwhile, there were seven objects passing one after another  following the same path. there were three closer together. my husband caught a ufo in the telescope briefly as it was moving through. i got a small glimpse of it as well. then i decided to run upstairs to get binoculars. ufo' s kept coming. we lost count of them. i focused binoculars and what i've seen was exactly what my husband have seen in telescope what was not visible to the naked eye. 
there was a dome which was made out of some reflective material which had small white lightings at the ridges. it was at least double the size of the red - orange light at the bottom. it seems that ufo' s were ascending from near by golf course. as they passed by our house ( about a mile away) they were gaining heights very gradually, then they turned northwest away from us and disappeared quite fast.
there were total at least 15 of them. we tried to take some pictures and videos but they didn't turn out well. in the dark all you can see is a red light out of focus. they were completely silent, all we could hear were crickets in our backyard. the whole experiance lasted about 10 minutes.
what we have seen through telescope and binoculars were the important  testimony for us.  both of us have seen the same thing which was amazing beyond believe. this is our first experience.
content.summary: 15 to 20 fireball ufo's ascending in the same path. through telescope and binoculars doom above the orange red lights was observable.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were just sitting out on a back road drinking a beer after work,we were on top of a hill called red hill when we noticed a white light rise up from roellen bottoms when it got to a certain hieght it changed to red and slowly silently flew over us . it was followed by several more that did the same. neither of us could come up with any other explanation of what we saw except ufos. i have seen things in this area before once when i was in the bottoms . i witnessed a trio of lights in a triangular shape fly over me at what appeared to be a low altitude. i have heard one other story of a cigar shaped ufo in the area.
content.summary: A friend and i watched several lights rise from a wetland they appeared to rise up red and then turnwhite as they flew over us with no sound. i

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were just sitting out on a back road drinking a beer after work,we were on top of a hill called red hill when we noticed a white light rise up from roellen bottoms when it got to a certain hieght it changed to red and slowly silently flew over us . it was followed by several more that did the same. neither of us could come up with any other explanation of what we saw except ufos. i have seen things in this area before once when i was in the bottoms . i witnessed a trio of lights in a triangular shape fly over me at what appeared to be a low altitude. i have heard one other story of a cigar shaped ufo in the area.
content.summary: A friend and i watched several lights rise from a wetland they appeared to rise up red and then turnwhite as they flew over us with no sound. i

content.detailedDescription: While i was on our deck while my husband was working in the yard, i first noticed a contrail going across a clear blue sky. it drew my attention and i saw that it was a passenger jet heading toward the atlanta airport but approaching on a different flight path than what is the norm. then i saw directly behind the jet a much smaller craft with no contrail that was keeping up with the jet and following right behind the jet (about two inches from my viewpoint). there were no distinct features of the smaller craft except that it appeared to be silver and oval shaped with a light blue light shining from the front of the craft. it was obviously not a small jet or prop plane. i called out to my husband to look, but he saw only the jet plane and when i said, "no, look at what is following it", it was too late as both had passed our field of vision. it definitely gave me an odd feeling as i'd not seen anything like it before and was very disappointed that my husband did not also see it.
content.summary: While watching a passenger jet approach atlanta saw small ufo following jet emitting blue light on front

content.detailedDescription: 15 miles west of athens ga, walking our dog around 9-9:15 pm, we noticed a bright orange ball that had a mild pulsing light similar to an airplane in the south sky traveling north towards us; i initially thought it was an airplane but as it got closer, there was no engine noise, nor did it have the blinking lights of an airplane, it was a barely notoceable pulsing light. it appeared to be ascending but it was not on a normal flight path in this area. we stood still watching it fly overhead, northbound, and within three seconds of passing over us, it completely dissapeard to the north,(just above highway 316 between collins hill and carl bethlehem rd in barrow county, ga.).
content.summary: We sighted an orange red ball in the south sky, traveling north; flew right over head and seemed to be ascending. after it flew past us, the lights pulsed once or twice and then dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend of mine and i were riding my motorcycle north of helen,ga on highway 17/75 monday april 9th.  we stopped and took some pictures along the way.  at the time we did not see anything out of the ordinary.

upon returning to louisiana and going through the pictures on sunday april 15th, i noticed this object in the top right hand corner of one of the pictures.  a picture taken 4 seconds before this one and another picture taken 10 seconds after of the same area does not show the object.  it was a cloudless day.

the object appears to reflect sunlight from above and is dark on the bottom.  the object is blurry as if it may have been moving quickly.
content.summary: Noticed object in a picture taken north of helen, ga

content.detailedDescription: As a commercial pilot, i take many photos of interesting and beautiful scenery as my work load/duties permit.  i took the attached photo some time in march(2012)while flying over a portion of the grand canyon at approx 39,000 feet. the lights in the upper right of the photo were not noticed until some time later after i had time to look over all the photos that i had taken during that tour. i do not claim that the lights are ufos, but i have used my blackberry cell phone's camera for years and i know that the lights are not a reflection from within the cockpit.  again, i did not even notice them when i took the photo.  just though mufon might like to have the photo/information.  (i'm having some computer skill issues with attaching the photo. if the photo does not come through, i can try to attach it again).
content.summary: I took this photo while flying over the grand canyon.  i did not notice the lights prior to taking the photo.

content.detailedDescription:
I wanted to share this story because it may or may not be related to another incident in fayetteville in 2007.

i lived in fayetteville, nc from 2004-2006.  shortly after moving to the area i began having night time encounters with beings.  i first noticed bright lights in the bedroom windows, then found myself unable to move or speak.  i saw several beings around the bed. they did not speak or move, but seemed to be projecting images into my mind.  they flashed colors and images that varied from the humorous to terrifying images of war.  as suddenly as they appeared they were gone and i was able to move again.  this happened several times, even after we changed residences.  we moved from fayetteville to crestview in 2006, and there have been no incidents that i remember specifically since.  

the entities were similar to the "typical" alien, with a grey sin with an almost metallic sheen and large black eyes that didnt blink.  they were smaller than an adult human and appeared to hover around the bed.  

after these encounters, i began to have debilitating anxiety and personality issues as well as some physical issues that may or may not be related to the encounters.

i have always attributed these events to the phenomenon of sleep paralysis, and kind of laughed them off.  i wanted to share this information just in case it could be helpful.  it may well have been a physcological or physical issue, but the memories of these events are so vivid that i really don't know if it is real or not.

i briefly discussed this incident with a mufon investigator while describing a group of objects that i saw, and again at that time, i blamed it on sleep paralysis. 

i discussed these events with my family and it kind of became a running joke, but in the back of my mind, i have always had a feeling that something sinister had been taking place.
content.summary: I only saw bright lights shining in the winows and experienced beingst

content.detailedDescription: It was 10 pm, mom and i  were getting out of the car, when i saw a bright light came over the tree tops.  it looked like a flare, but got higher and started moving west.  we watched it go right over us, then another came over the tree, and then 2 more.  they were exactly the same and flew directly behind each other right over us and continued west to the gulf.They looked like a hot air balloon with fire at the bottom. no sound, i watched them till it seemed the fire went out and i couldnt see them.  i was able to take a pic with my cell phone.  i was standing northwest watching them come over the tree tops. it was probably  1-2 mins.
content.summary: Came over the trees, looked like a flare at first but got brighter and higher in the sky.  a total of 4  fiery objects came over the tree tops and headed due west over the gulf, making no sound

content.detailedDescription: We were at work when the cook ran in to get us, he was really freaked out. we work at a hotel in west chester pa and i wasnt going going to report this until i saw that the same lights appeared in texas city a few days later. these lights would appear and then disappear and at 1 point we counted 22 of them. they didnt seem to have any direction but they were reddish orange in color. as far as the reaction well, you can clearly hear that on the video. the video is a little shaky but in the beginning of the first video, you can really see them. the second video was shot towards the end of the sighting and if you watch long enouph at the one light, you will suddenly see a second light appear under it. they looked like they were spining or something. i cant explain it but im still freaked out about it.
content.summary: These lights would appear and then disappear, at one point we counted 22 of them.

content.detailedDescription:
The saturday before easter, we had about 30 family members at my place for an easter egg hunt. my grown daughter and i were sitting in a lawn swing talking and looking at the beautiful puffy white clouds, when she pointed, and excitedly said "what in the world is that". at about the same time i also saw it. what we observed was a very fast moving, pure white sphere-like object, traveling at an unusually high speed. it was moving from due east towards due west. i say sphere-like because it did not appear to have any defined boundaries, and was the whiteness of the whitest portion of the clouds, yet it held sphere like shape. the blue sky was very clear between clouds so we saw it very clearly for a short period of time. it did not "shine" as in reflective. it was simply cloud white.
we first spotted it at about 45 degrees above eastern horizon, and lost it in clouds at about 45 degrees above western horizon. it traveled in a straight line almost overhead (85 degrees above horizon, and covered this distance in about 4-5 seconds. cloud tops estimated at 6500ft. the object appeared to be flying just above the lowest clouds and through one of the tallest cloud. wind and cloud direction from nw to se.  did a little flying years ago and am pretty good judge but have not confirmed from official sources. if held at arms length, it would have been about the size of a contact lens. it made no sound, and left no contrail. we both had the feeling that whatever it was, was "on a mission". 
i had my cellphone in my hand, but it happened so fast that it was gone before i even thought about it.
content.summary: White spherical object observed traveling at very high speed.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking from my car up my walk to my front door when i noticed 3 bright orange/red lights flying south to north(which is against the normal flow of air traffic).  the lights were in a straight line and seemed to turn towards the west a bit over the ocean and as they were turning the first one faded and disappeared, then after a few more seconds the last one faded and then the last continued on n/w until it faded from view as well. i called my mom out as it was happening, but she caught the end of it and wasn't very impressed.
content.summary: Three orbs flying south to north, then turning north/west and fading out.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work and i met up with a contractor to explain a job i had for him to do.  he was looking down at a list i gave him when i had an urge to look up.  as i looked up i noticed what looked like either a flash of light or a glint from the sun reflecting off of its surface. it was hovering motionless for about 15 seconds giving me time to point it out to my co worker and the contractor. it then took off slowly as if it were fluttering up and down erratically then taking off very quickly. the object made a sharp 90 degree turn then straight, another 90 then straight again. the object then shot off while vearing to the left slightly. we sat and watched it without saying a word until it was no longer visible. as it took off, it looked to be moving much faster than any jet i had ever seen. it was a very cool experience. the object looked like a large white/pink orb that seemed to be disk shaped and reflected sun light as it changed direction. about 10 seconds after it had left sight we saw an f=16 headed in the same direction fast.
content.summary: Had an urge to look up, saw a flash and object started moving north, then east, then north

content.detailedDescription: I was at work and i met up with a contractor to explain a job i had for him to do.  he was looking down at a list i gave him when i had an urge to look up.  as i looked up i noticed what looked like either a flash of light or a glint from the sun reflecting off of its surface. it was hovering motionless for about 15 seconds giving me time to point it out to my co worker and the contractor. it then took off slowly as if it were fluttering up and down erratically then taking off very quickly. the object made a sharp 90 degree turn then straight, another 90 then straight again. the object then shot off while vearing to the left slightly. we sat and watched it without saying a word until it was no longer visible. as it took off, it looked to be moving much faster than any jet i had ever seen. it was a very cool experience. the object looked like a large white/pink orb that seemed to be disk shaped and reflected sun light as it changed direction. about 10 seconds after it had left sight we saw an f=16 headed in the same direction fast.
content.summary: Had an urge to look up, saw a flash and object started moving north, then east, then north

content.detailedDescription: I saw two of them with binoculars the first one was like a stretch diamond color like a black and shinny too turning slowly thee second one was a cyclinder with a square on the bottom but nut a true square had like a tail on it color was like a black crome the square on the bottom was gray with black lines in it runnimg thur it , also it was just drifting in the sky when the sun hit it was really shiny i could see this with my binoculars i watch it for thirty minute it was like i was in the movies,i never seen anything like this also i was with two other poeple and we shared the binoculars i felt like i was seeing something out of this world then ill call my brother ans he tracked it coming over the resevior for about thirty mintues then he saw a jet fighter flying real low to the ground , the jet was going in the direction of the object then he lost it from his site. there were all kinds of people pulled over on highway 152
content.summary: First one like a stretch diamond second one a cylinder with a square on the bottom

content.detailedDescription: Getting ready to go to bed ...  look out to check the weather . that is when i saw a object of a bright orb....     watched it over a hour . went outside to show neighbor
content.summary: Very bright diamond shape craft

content.detailedDescription: Took this photo at a construction site for work today. i only noticed the object in the photo later when i was reviewing the construction photos back at the office. tried to zoom in on the thing and increase the resolution (close-up photo attached) -- still have no idea what it is.
content.summary: Spherical metallic object with flat bottom. black oval shapes on bottom of object. see photo.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and 3 other friends were driving down a dark road, we were the only car in sight on march 14 2012 between 9:33pm and 9:34pm. the low flying object was a white blue light that was so bright it caught everyone in the cars attention at once, it hovered for a split second and then zoomed off and disappeared. we were located between grantline elementary school and indiana university southeast in new albany indiana driving towards ius.
content.summary: Above trees came into sight hovered then shot up and away and disapeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west on hwy 152 from los banos, ca at 7:30am.  as i drove past the dam at the east end of san luis resevoir i saw a bright light above the hills on the west end of the lake.  my first thought was that it was a reflection of the sun behind me off a low flying silver airplane.  the light was not moving so i thought it might be a reflection off the tip of a radio tower.  i was not aware of a radio tower in the area so over the next couple of miles i looked hard to see if i could spot on underneath the light.  as i drovealong the north side of the lake and over pacheco pass for the next five minutes or so, i lost visual contact with the light.  as i descended the pass, i noticed a white car parked along the road and a man standing next to it with binoculars.  around the next curve i saw 4 cars pulled over, with people out of the cars looking upward to the south.  i thought they had spotted a california condor or some other rare bird.  around the next corner were 6 cars pulled over.  i had to know what they were looking at.  i pulled over and looked up.  there was a large metallic rectangle perched in the sky.

i got out of my truck and immediately began talking to the man & woman from the next car.  over the next 15 minutes we talked about everything we saw, so i know we all saw the same thing and had the same questions.

i saw a large rectangle floating in the sky at roughly 60 degrees up from the horizon.  i extimate that the rectangle was half a mile or less from us, 80 feet high and 50 feet wide.  the side facing us was silver metallic
in color.  it was highly reflective, like mylar.  it was silvery except when it reflected the sun at us.  the bursts of reflection were sporadic as though there was equipment or a texture of some sort on the surface.

the object was stationary and silent.  we looked for wings and balloons, and listened for motors.  we saw no means of propulsion or levitation with which we were familiar.  after a few minutes, perhaps 5, the object began to rotate.  as it rotated 90 degrees, we saw that the side was very narrow and black.  it rotated a little more and we saw that the back was also black in color.  the narrow side showed us that the overall shape of the object was similar to a mattress or paperback book.  the corners and edges were crisp like a book rather than rounded like a mattress.  given my estimate of a 50x80 foot object, i estimate that the thickness was about 5 feet.

once the object rotated we observed that it was moving slowly toward the southwest.  the winds were blowing gently in that direction, so it is possible that the object was drifting with the wind.  we continued to look, almost compulsively, for evidence of a helium-filled balloon.  the object did not appear to change its elevation.

after 10 minutes the object had moved far enough away from us that it was a small black speck with one small bright reflective spot.  at this point the man and his wife left.  i watched the object 5 minutes more, until 8:00am, and then left.  its appearance did not change again.

the object could have been a giant book shaped balloon filled with helium made of silver and black mylar.  the hurdles to this possibility are: 1) a very odd shape and orientation for a balloon, 2) object did not appear to flex or otherwise react to the wind, 3) there is no apparent source of a 20,000cf balloon that would only have risen to 400-800 yards near san luis reservoir (closest towns are 20 miles east and 20 miles west) 4) object rotated 90 degrees then stopped rather than continuing its rotation from angular momentum, 5) the edges appeared crisp like metal rather than puffy like a mylar balloon.
content.summary: San luis reservoir
